name: POLYDRIVE
description:
Polydrive is a simple driving game, the idea is to eventually create open free-world maps to drive in as well as scenarios.

This is a very early build, any feedback and ideas are much appreciated!

As of Prototype v0.01, you can simply drive around 2 empty maps and one playground with some bumps, ramp and dirt track.

If you are a coder and would like to help me please don't hesitate to msg me on discord  renderbydavid#0153 I'm more of a 3D artist..
